root.name: saveStream()
root.description:
Save the contents of a stream to a file in the sketch folder. This is equivalent to calling loadBytes() followed immediately by saveBytes(), but is implemented more efficiently (and with less confusing syntax).
When using the targetFile parameter, it writes to a File object for greater control over the file location. (Note that unlike other API methods, this will not automatically compress or uncompress gzip files.)

parameter.label: targetFilename
parameter.description: String: name of the file to write to

parameter.label: sourceLocation
parameter.description: String: location to save the file

parameter.label: targetFile
parameter.description: File: the file to write to
